entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
